scripts.convert: node clear.js && node copy.js && webpack --mode production && sass ../document-management-web/src/main/resources/static_origin:../document-management-web/src/main/resources/static --embed-source-map
scripts.build: node clear.js && node copy.js && webpack --mode production --no-devtool && sass ../document-management-web/src/main/resources/static_origin:../document-management-web/src/main/resources/static --no-source-map && node clear.js
